attributes.action: Get faster internet connections for the whole country.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In the UK, internet connections in certain areas are not very fast. I am unable to provide certain things to my consumers, and to do other various tasks on the internet. My friend in America has 24mb broadband, something we do not have in the U.K, for citizens.  People in Korea have unlimited broadband with speeds of up 100mb/s. 

We need to bring the technology services in the UK forward, other wise will be products that we are unable to use products that we have brought.

Please consider my argument

James Bayliss.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
